DOC.brief_summary: Prospective multicentric randomize trial evaluate role uterine manipulator laparoscopic/robotic total hysterectomy treatment early stage G1 - G2 endometrial cancer ( International Federation Gynecology Obstetrics - FIGO stag IA-IB ) .
DOC.detailed_description: This multicentric prospective randomize Phase III trial aim verify use uterine manipulator laparoscopic/robotic treatment early stage endometrial cancer influence impact peritoneal cytology lymph vascular space invasion ( LVSI ) outcomes term perioperative oncological ( disease free survival - DFS , overall survival - OS ) outcomes .
